ui_button_lock.message: Lock to Interact with Apps & Widgets

ui_confirm_reset.message: Are you sure you want to reset widget and app placements, stock widget preferences (notepad, coloring, etc.), and coloring preferences? Any customizations will be irrevocably lost.

ui_confirm_uninstall.message: Are you sure you want to uninstall $app$?

ui_note_apps.message: "Unlock" to drag apps to your home screen, or quickly access them here. "Lock" to uninstall apps.

ui_note_widgets.message: "Unlock" to drag widgets to your home screen. Mouseover to see how wide/tall it is.

tutorial_1_desc1.message: A New Tab Page (NTP) replacement that doesn't suck.

tutorial_1_desc2.message: (... or at least tries really hard not to.)

tutorial_2_desc1.message: Icons are out-dated. Technology is pacing forward, with extremely powerful and dynamic widgets found in Android, Windows Phone 7, and (soon) Windows 8.

tutorial_2_desc2.message: This extension is a start at bringing the same power to Chrome's New Tab Page.

tutorial_3_desc1.message: Click unlock and move widgets and icons to wherever you want. Delete things you don't want (when they're unlocked).

tutorial_4_desc1.message: Don't worry, your apps haven't gone too far.

tutorial_4_desc2.message: Feel free to unlock tiles then drag apps to your home screen.

tutorial_4_desc3.message: Show what you regularly use, hide everything else.

tutorial_5_desc1.message: Enjoy! Remember to give this app 5 stars on the Web Store.

tutorial_5_desc2.message: Got an idea for this extension? Leave it here.

tutorial_5_desc3.message: Make your own widgets! Find out how here:

ui_config_bgimg1.message: Advanced (CSS): Use your own image (hosted elsewhere, like Flickr or Picasa). The image should at least be your monitor's resolution.

ui_config_bgimg3.message: Erase the box to use the default background (solid color).

ui_config_share1.message: Do you like Awesome New Tab Page? Why not share it with friends and family?

ui_shortcut_img.message: Image URL must be exactly 128px by 128px, preferably in PNG format with alpha transparency. To reset to default, just erase everything in the field.

notepad_default.message:
Type anything here. Everything you type will be saved on every keystroke.

Be careful though; there are NO backups, and the Reset button *DOES* reset this widget!
